p.raw: Hello John, This is your invoice from Klarna, the total amount to pay is 150.00Kr

This is a test. We suppose the following text should not be wrongfully passed, and the spaces should also be maintained rightly: This is a dynamic text, the following is the static text, note the difference between #term and #term. (8 spaces)\\#term\\
This line contains no params. Later it will be used as a "improper" template too make sure that the program will discard improper template, using #nonexistParam
